title: Rename brand to Wed Shilpi and remove pricing/partners/social icons

requirements.text: Replace the site/company name everywhere in user-facing copy from "aurora" to "Wed Shilpi" (including header/footer branding text, image alt text, and copyright text where applicable).

quotes: Can you change the name aurora to Wed Shilpi.

acceptanceCriteria: No visible UI text contains the old brand name "aurora".
Header and footer branding/alt text reflect "Wed Shilpi".

requirements.text: Remove the pricing-related FAQ item from the FAQ section so no FAQ question/answer discusses or lists pricing ranges.

quotes: 1) Can you please remove the pricing part in FAQs.

acceptanceCriteria: The FAQ item "How much does a website cost?" is removed from the rendered FAQ accordion.
No remaining FAQ answers contain pricing figures or pricing ranges.

requirements.text: Remove any mention of professional photography partners from the website content (including the FAQ answer about content and images).

quotes: 2) Remove telling about professional photography partners.

acceptanceCriteria: No section (including FAQs) mentions recommending partners for professional photography.
The FAQ item about content/images is updated to remove the partner referral sentence while keeping the rest coherent in English.

requirements.text: Remove the social media icons/links for Facebook, Instagram, X, and LinkedIn from the site (including the footer icon row).

quotes: 3) Remove social media icon of Facebook, insta,X,linkedin.

acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer renders icons/links for Facebook, Instagram, X, or LinkedIn.
No social media icon components for those networks remain visible anywhere on the site.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Do not add new social media links or replace removed social icons with other networks.
Do not change the contact form fields, inquiry submission behavior, or backend inquiry API as part of this change.
